title: Skin Disease Treatment Packages
sortDescription: At Divine Homoeo Care, we provide specialized homoeopathic treatment packages for all types of skin diseases, designed to offer safe, natural, and effective healing. Each package includes doctor consultations and our carefully prescribed specialized homoeopathic medicines.

faq.question: How much time will it take to cure my skin disease?
faq.answer: It depends on disease to disease and person to person. On average, it usually takes a minimum of 3 to 6 months for visible and long-lasting improvement.

faq.question: Are the medicines safe?
faq.answer: Yes, our medicines are 100% safe, natural, and free from side effects. They are prescribed and prepared by qualified doctors as per classical homoeopathic principles.

faq.question: Do I need to visit the clinic physically?
faq.answer: No, physical visits are not required. After purchasing a package, our doctor will contact you for consultation and then medicines will be sent to your doorstep.

faq.question: What kind of skin diseases can this package help with?
faq.answer: Our package is effective for a wide range of skin problems such as fungal infections, ringworm, eczema, psoriasis, acne, allergies, recurrent rashes, pigmentation disorders, and other chronic skin conditions.

faq.question: How will I receive the medicines?
faq.answer: After consultation, our doctor will prepare personalized medicines for you and deliver them safely to your home.

faq.question: Can I extend my package later?
faq.answer: Yes, you can extend or upgrade your package anytime. Many patients continue with monthly packages for better results and continuous care.

description:
Homoeopathy Skin Disease Treatment Packages

Struggling with skin problems that don’t go away? Whether it’s fungal infections, ringworm, eczema, psoriasis, acne, allergy-related rashes, or other chronic skin conditions that have troubled you for years — our Specialized Homoeopathy Skin Disease Package is designed to provide gentle, effective, and long-term relief without harmful side effects.

Why choose Divine Homoeo Care?
  • Personalized treatment: Each case is evaluated by an experienced homoeopathic doctor.
  • Root-cause approach: We focus on treating the underlying cause, not just symptoms.
  • Safe & natural: Medicine prepared using classical homoeopathic principles.
  • Doorstep delivery: Medicines prepared for you and sent to your address.
How it works
  1. After buying a package, our doctor will contact you personally to take a detailed case history and understand your skin condition.
  2. Based on your symptoms and case history, the doctor will prescribe and prepare specialized homoeopathic medicines tailored for you.
  3. Your medicines will be packaged and dispatched to your address. The doctor will be available for follow-up consultations according to the package you choose.
Available Packages
15 Days Package — ₹1000
  • 1 Doctor Consultation
  • Specialized Homoeopathic Medicines for 15 days
  • Doctor will contact you after purchase to collect details
1 Month Package — ₹2000
  • 2 Doctor Consultations
  • Specialized Homoeopathic Medicines for 1 month
  • Doctor will contact you after purchase and medicines will be prepared & sent
Conditions we treat (examples)

We provide care for a wide range of skin problems including all types of fungal infections, ringworm, psoriasis, eczema, chronic acne, recurrent rashes, pigmentation issues, allergy-related dermatitis, and other long-standing skin disorders.

Ready to start? Purchase the package that suits you, and our doctor will reach out to begin your personalized treatment plan. Experience natural, long-term improvement with the trusted approach of homoeopathy.

title: Kidney Stone Treatment Packages
sortDescription: At Divine Homoeo Care, we provide specialized homoeopathic treatment packages for kidney stones. Our safe and natural approach helps dissolve stones, relieve pain, and prevent recurrence without surgery.

faq.question: Can homoeopathy really dissolve kidney stones?
faq.answer: Yes, homoeopathy can help dissolve small to medium-sized kidney stones naturally, relieve pain, and prevent recurrence. Larger stones may take more time or require additional treatment.

faq.question: Will I need surgery?
faq.answer: In most cases, surgery can be avoided. With timely homoeopathic treatment, stones can dissolve and pass naturally without invasive procedures.

faq.question: How long will it take to see results?
faq.answer: The duration depends on the size and number of stones. On average, visible relief starts within a few weeks, while complete treatment may take 3–6 months.

faq.question: Are the medicines safe?
faq.answer: Yes, our medicines are safe, natural, and without side effects. They are prescribed by qualified doctors after a detailed case study.

faq.question: Do I need to visit the clinic?
faq.answer: No, physical visits are not necessary. After purchase, our doctor will consult you online/telephonically and medicines will be sent to your home.

title: Piles (Hemorrhoids) Treatment Packages

faq.question: Can homoeopathy cure piles permanently?
faq.answer: Yes, homoeopathy can provide long-term and permanent relief by treating the root cause of piles such as chronic constipation, digestive issues, and venous weakness.

faq.question: Will I need surgery?
faq.answer: In most cases, surgery is not required. Homoeopathy can effectively reduce swelling, pain, bleeding, and recurrence of piles without invasive procedures.

faq.question: How much time will it take to see results?
faq.answer: Relief in pain, itching, and bleeding can start within weeks, but complete treatment and prevention of recurrence usually takes 3–6 months.

faq.question: Are the medicines safe?
faq.answer: Yes, our medicines are 100% safe, natural, and without side effects. They are prepared and prescribed by qualified doctors after detailed consultation.

faq.question: Do I need to visit the clinic?
faq.answer: No, you don’t need to visit physically. Our doctor will contact you after purchase, conduct consultation, and medicines will be delivered to your home.

title: Lipoma Treatment Packages

title: Hairfall Treatment Package
shortDescription: Comprehensive treatment for hair loss, thinning, and scalp-related issues using safe and natural remedies.
description: Our Hairfall Treatment Package is designed to address hair loss, thinning, and weak hair roots. We focus on treating the underlying causes such as stress, nutritional deficiencies, hormonal imbalance, or scalp conditions. With personalized homeopathic and natural treatment, we aim to strengthen hair roots, improve scalp health, and promote healthy hair regrowth without side effects.

faqs.question: How long will it take to see results?
faqs.answer: Most patients see reduced hair fall within 1 to 2 months. Visible regrowth generally takes 3 to 6 months depending on the condition.

faqs.question: Is this treatment safe for all age groups?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is safe for men, women, and even young adults as it uses natural and homeopathic remedies.

faqs.question: Will my hair grow back completely?
faqs.answer: Results vary depending on the severity of hair loss and the health of hair follicles. In most cases, significant improvement is seen with consistent treatment.

faqs.question: Can I use oil or shampoo during the treatment?
faqs.answer: Yes, but we recommend mild, chemical-free products. Our doctors can guide you on the best options.

title: Tumor Treatment Package
shortDescription: Specialized homeopathic treatment package for benign tumors such as lipoma, fibroma, cysts, and other non-cancerous growths.
description:
Homoeopathy Tumor Treatment Packages

Facing a benign lump or growth can be worrying. Our Tumor Treatment Package at Divine Homoeo Care offers a safe, non-invasive, and individualized homoeopathic approach for benign tumors such as lipomas, fibromas, sebaceous cysts, and other non-cancerous swellings. Instead of rushing into surgery, our experienced doctors aim to reduce the size of the growth, relieve discomfort, and prevent recurrence by treating the root causes.

Why choose this package?
  • Individualized care: Every case is evaluated thoroughly — medical history, duration, growth behavior, and any prior interventions.
  • Non-surgical option: Safe homoeopathic medicines aimed at gradual reduction of the tumor and symptomatic relief without invasive procedures.
  • Symptom management: Reduces pain, tenderness, pressure, and local inflammation associated with lumps.
  • Prevention-focused: Treatment works on underlying metabolic and constitutional factors to lower the chance of new growths.
  • Doorstep delivery & follow-up: Medicines prepared specially for you and sent to your address; follow-ups included as per package.
How the process works
  1. After you purchase the package, our doctor will contact you for a detailed case history — size, mobility, rate of growth, symptoms, and any reports or scans you may have.
  2. Where available, you may be asked to share ultrasound/X-ray/MRI or biopsy reports so the doctor can tailor the treatment precisely.
  3. The doctor will prescribe individualized homoeopathic medicines and supportive lifestyle/diet advice to support healing.
  4. Medicines will be prepared and dispatched to your address. The doctor will remain available for follow-up and monitoring during the treatment period.
Available Packages
15 Days Package — ₹1000
  • 1 Doctor Consultation
  • Personalized homoeopathic medicines for 15 days
  • Doctor will contact you after purchase to collect details and any reports
1 Month Package — ₹2000
  • 2 Doctor Consultations
  • Personalized homoeopathic medicines for 1 month
  • Follow-up and monitoring; guidance on tests if required
Who can benefit?

This package is intended for patients with benign growths such as small-to-moderate lipomas, fibromas, sebaceous cysts, and similar non-malignant lumps. If there is any suspicion of malignancy or alarming features (rapid growth, hard fixed mass, unexplained systemic symptoms), you will be advised immediate medical evaluation and referral as needed.

Important: Homoeopathy offers a conservative alternative and often reduces size and symptoms over time, but outcomes depend on the type, size, location, and duration of the tumor. Our doctors will guide you honestly about realistic expectations and the need for any investigations.

Ready to begin? Choose the package that suits you, upload any reports if available, and our doctor will contact you to start a personalized, safe, and monitored treatment plan.

faqs.question: Can homeopathy completely remove a tumor?
faqs.answer: In many benign tumors, homeopathy helps in reducing the size and preventing recurrence. Results depend on the type, size, and duration of the tumor.

faqs.question: How much time does it take to see improvement?
faqs.answer: Initial changes such as reduction in discomfort may be seen within 1 to 2 months. Significant reduction in size usually requires 3 to 6 months or more.

faqs.question: Is this treatment safe if I am already taking other medicines?
faqs.answer: Yes, homeopathy can be safely taken alongside other treatments, but our doctor will guide you for best results.

faqs.question: Do I need surgery along with this treatment?
faqs.answer: In most benign tumors, surgery can be avoided with consistent homeopathic treatment. However, our doctor will evaluate your condition before suggesting the best course.

title: Psoriasis Treatment Package
sortDescription: At Divine Homoeo Care, we provide specialized homoeopathic treatment packages for Psoriasis, designed to relieve itching, scaling, redness, and prevent recurrences. Our approach is natural, safe, and aims for long-term relief by treating the root cause.

faq.question: How long does it take to see improvement in Psoriasis?
faq.answer: Results vary from person to person. Initial relief in itching and scaling may be noticed within a few weeks, while long-term control generally requires 3 to 6 months of continuous treatment.

faq.question: Can homeopathy cure Psoriasis completely?
faq.answer: Homeopathy works by controlling flare-ups, reducing severity, and addressing the root cause. While Psoriasis is a chronic condition, many patients experience long-lasting relief and significant improvement.

faq.question: Are there any side effects?
faq.answer: No, our medicines are 100% safe, natural, and free from side effects. They are prescribed after a detailed case history by qualified homeopathic doctors.

faq.question: Do I need to visit the clinic physically?
faq.answer: No, you don’t need to visit physically. After you buy the package, our doctor will call you for a detailed consultation and your medicines will be delivered to your home.

faq.question: What symptoms of Psoriasis can this package help with?
faq.answer: Our package provides relief from itching, redness, scaling, cracked skin, burning, joint pain in psoriatic arthritis, and reduces the frequency of flare-ups.

faq.question: Can I extend my package later?
faq.answer: Yes, you can extend or upgrade your package anytime. Since Psoriasis is usually long-term, many patients continue treatment for several months for sustained improvement.
